MODULE.name: AUDPROC_MODULE_ID_VOL_CTRL
MODULE.description:
ID of the volume control module.
This module#[ #] supports the following parameter IDs:
- #AUDPROC_PARAM_ID_VOL_CTRL_MASTER_GAIN
- #AUDPROC_PARAM_ID_VOL_CTRL_MUTE_CONFIG
-#[ #] #AUDPROC_PARAM_ID_SOFT_VOL_STEPPING_PARAMETERS
- #AUDPROC_PARAM_ID_SOFT_PAUSE_PARAMETERS
- #AUDPROC_PARAM_ID_MULTICHANNEL_GAIN
-#[ #] #AUDPROC_PARAM_ID_MULTICHANNEL_GAIN_V2
- #AUDPROC_PARAM_ID_MULTICHANNEL_MUTE
- #AUDPROC_PARAM_ID_MULTICHANNEL_MUTE_V2
All parameter IDs are device#[ #] independent.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: master_gain
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Specifies linear master gain.\n

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: reserved
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Clients must set this field to 0.\n

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: mute_flag
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Specifies whether mute is enabled. \n

PARAMETER.name: AUDPROC_PARAM_ID_SOFT_VOL_STEPPING_PARAMETERS
PARAMETER.description:
Specifies Soft Stepping Volume#[ #] parameters.
Supported parameters for a soft stepping linear ramping curve
AUDPROC_PARAM_SVC_RAMPINGCURVE_LINEAR - 0 

Exponential ramping#[ #] curve
AUDPROC_PARAM_SVC_RAMPINGCURVE_EXP - 1 

Logarithmic ramping curve
AUDPROC_PARAM_SVC_RAMPINGCURVE_LOG - 2 

Fractional exponent#[ #] ramping curve
AUDPROC_PARAM_SVC_RAMPINGCURVE_FRAC_EXP - 3

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: period
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Specifies period in milliseconds.\n

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: step
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Specifies step in microseconds.\n

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: ramping_curve
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description:
Specifies ramping curve type.
Supported Values:

Supported parameters for a soft stepping linear ramping curve -#[ #] AUDPROC_PARAM_SVC_RAMPINGCURVE_LINEAR
 
Exponential ramping curve - AUDPROC_PARAM_SVC_RAMPINGCURVE_EXP 

Logarithmic ramping curve - #[ #] AUDPROC_PARAM_SVC_RAMPINGCURVE_LOG 
 
Fractional exponent ramping curve - AUDPROC_PARAM_SVC_RAMPINGCURVE_FRAC_EXP

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: enable_flag
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Specifies whether soft pause is enabled.\n

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: period
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Specifies period in milliseconds.\n

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: step
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Specifies step in milliseconds.\n

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: ramping_curve
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Specifies ramping curve.\n

PARAMETER.name: AUDPROC_PARAM_ID_MULTICHANNEL_GAIN
PARAMETER.description: VOLUME_CONTROL_MAX_CHANNELS - 8. \n Payload of the#[ #] AUDPROC_PARAM_ID_MULTICHANNEL_GAIN channel type/gain pairs used by the Volume Control module.\nThis structure immediately follows the#[ #] audproc_volume_ctrl_multichannel_gain_t structure.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: num_channels
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Number of channels for which gain values are provided. Any channels present in the data for which gain is not provided are set to unity#[ #] gain.\n

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: gain_data
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Array of channel type/gain pairs.\nSupported values :- see the payload of the structure.\n

PARAMETER.name: AUDPROC_PARAM_ID_MULTICHANNEL_MUTE
PARAMETER.description: Payload of the AUDPROC_PARAM_ID_MULTICHANNEL_MUTE channel#[ #] type/mute setting pairs used by the Volume Control module.\nThis structure immediately follows the audproc_volume_ctrl_multichannel_mute_t#[ #] structure.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: num_channels
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Number of channels for which mute configuration is provided. Any channels present in the data for which mute configuration is not#[ #] provided are set to unmute.\n

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: mute_data
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Array of channel type/mute setting pairs.\nSupported values :- see the payload of the structure.\n

MODULE.name: AUDPROC_MODULE_ID_VOL_CTRL_INSTANCE_2
MODULE.description:
ID of the Volume Control#[ #] module pre/postprocessing block, instance 2. Use this module together with AUDPROC_MODULE_ID_VOL_CTRL to have two volume controls in a#[ #] pre/postprocessing chain.
This module supports the same parameter IDs that AUDPROC_MODULE_ID_VOL_CTRL supports:
This module supports the following#[ #] parameter IDs:
- #AUDPROC_PARAM_ID_VOL_CTRL_MASTER_GAIN
- #AUDPROC_PARAM_ID_VOL_CTRL_MUTE_CONFIG
- #AUDPROC_PARAM_ID_SOFT_VOL_STEPPING_PARAMETERS
-#[ #] #AUDPROC_PARAM_ID_SOFT_PAUSE_PARAMETERS
- #AUDPROC_PARAM_ID_MULTICHANNEL_GAIN
- #AUDPROC_PARAM_ID_MULTICHANNEL_GAIN_V2
-#[ #] #AUDPROC_PARAM_ID_MULTICHANNEL_MUTE
- #AUDPROC_PARAM_ID_MULTICHANNEL_MUTE_V2
All parameter IDs are device independent.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: master_gain
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Specifies linear master gain.\n

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: reserved
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Clients must set this field to 0.\n

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: mute_flag
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Specifies whether mute is enabled. \n

PARAMETER.name: AUDPROC_PARAM_ID_SOFT_VOL_STEPPING_PARAMETERS
PARAMETER.description:
Specifies Soft Stepping Volume#[ #] parameters.
Supported parameters for a soft stepping linear ramping curve
AUDPROC_PARAM_SVC_RAMPINGCURVE_LINEAR - 0 

Exponential ramping#[ #] curve
AUDPROC_PARAM_SVC_RAMPINGCURVE_EXP - 1 

Logarithmic ramping curve
AUDPROC_PARAM_SVC_RAMPINGCURVE_LOG - 2 

Fractional exponent#[ #] ramping curve
AUDPROC_PARAM_SVC_RAMPINGCURVE_FRAC_EXP - 3

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: period
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Specifies period in milliseconds.\n

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: step
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Specifies step in microseconds.\n

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: ramping_curve
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description:
Specifies ramping curve type.
Supported Values:

Supported parameters for a soft stepping linear ramping curve -#[ #] AUDPROC_PARAM_SVC_RAMPINGCURVE_LINEAR
 
Exponential ramping curve - AUDPROC_PARAM_SVC_RAMPINGCURVE_EXP 

Logarithmic ramping curve - #[ #] AUDPROC_PARAM_SVC_RAMPINGCURVE_LOG 
 
Fractional exponent ramping curve - AUDPROC_PARAM_SVC_RAMPINGCURVE_FRAC_EXP

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: enable_flag
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Specifies whether soft pause is enabled.\n

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: period
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Specifies period in milliseconds.\n

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: step
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Specifies step in milliseconds.\n

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: ramping_curve
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Specifies ramping curve.\n

PARAMETER.name: AUDPROC_PARAM_ID_MULTICHANNEL_GAIN
PARAMETER.description: VOLUME_CONTROL_MAX_CHANNELS - 8. \n Payload of the#[ #] AUDPROC_PARAM_ID_MULTICHANNEL_GAIN channel type/gain pairs used by the Volume Control module.\nThis structure immediately follows the#[ #] audproc_volume_ctrl_multichannel_gain_t structure.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: num_channels
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Number of channels for which gain values are provided. Any channels present in the data for which gain is not provided are set to unity#[ #] gain.\n

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: gain_data

PARAMETER.name: AUDPROC_PARAM_ID_MULTICHANNEL_MUTE
PARAMETER.description: Payload of the AUDPROC_PARAM_ID_MULTICHANNEL_MUTE channel#[ #] type/mute setting pairs used by the Volume Control module.\nThis structure immediately follows the audproc_volume_ctrl_multichannel_mute_t#[ #] structure.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Number of channels for which mute configuration is provided. Any channels present in the data for which mute configuration is not#[ #] provided are set to unmute.\n
